about.title: My Developer Journey
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with over {{years}} years of experience, specializing in frontend technologies with Vue.js and React ecosystems. I've built web applications for various industries including project management, e-commerce, and media platforms. My strongest skills are in <vue>Vue/Nuxt</vue>, <react>React/Next</react>, <typescript>TypeScript</typescript>, and modern CSS with <tailwind>Tailwind</tailwind>, but I'm comfortable working across the stack when needed.
